QuestData.Title: A Gift for Raa'la
QuestData.Description: I need to pack up this kill. I promised my daughter Raa'la I would bring her home a gift from the hunt.$b$bThere are a couple baby Rylaks in the cave nearby. Maybe Raa'la would like one as a pet?$b$bWould you mind catching one while I finish up here?
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect a Baby Rylak for Raa'la in the Windswept Lowlands.
